transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from the sender's account to the recipient's account.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one account to another on behalf of the account holder.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the provided name, symbol, and initial set of addresses.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens for a specific account.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from a given address.

burnFrom.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the specified account.

checkSignature.description: Checks the validity of a signature against a given digest.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

finishedVotings.description: Checks if the voting process has been completed for a given ID.

getFullOracleSet.description: Returns the list of current oracles.

getNewBurnStatusId.description: Calculates a unique identifier based on new burn status and nonce.

getNewSetId.description: Calculates a unique identifier for a new oracle set.

getSwapDataId.description: Calculates a unique identifier for swap data.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

isOracle.description: Checks if a given address is an oracle.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

oraclesSet.description: Returns the address of a specific oracle set.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

voteForNewOracleSet.description: Votes for a new set of oracles.

voteForSwitchBurn.description: Votes to switch the burn status.
